description: A custom build of lodash library version 3.10.1, including only 'template' and 'escape' functions, with internal utility functions and support for template compilation and chaining.

methods.name: lodash
methods.description: Main lodash function, no operation performed.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Compiles a template string into a function that can interpolate data properties, escape HTML, and execute JavaScript code within delimiters.

methods.name: escape
methods.description: Escapes characters in a string to their corresponding HTML entities.

methods.name: attempt
methods.description: Attempts to invoke a function, returning the result or caught error.

methods.name: arrayEach
methods.description: Iterates over an array, invoking a function for each element.

methods.name: assignOwnDefaults
methods.description: Assigns default values to object properties if they are undefined or not own properties.

methods.name: assignWith
methods.description: Assigns properties from source to destination object with a customizer function.

methods.name: baseAssign
methods.description: Base implementation of assign without support for multiple sources.

methods.name: baseCopy
methods.description: Copies properties from source to object for specified keys.

methods.name: baseProperty
methods.description: Creates a function to get a property value by key.

methods.name: baseValues
methods.description: Creates an array of property values from an object for given keys.

methods.name: getLength
methods.description: Gets the 'length' property of an object.

methods.name: getNative
methods.description: Gets a native function at a given key of an object if it is native.

methods.name: isArrayLike
methods.description: Checks if a value is array-like.

methods.name: isIndex
methods.description: Checks if a value is a valid array index.

methods.name: isIterateeCall
methods.description: Checks if arguments are from an iteratee call.

methods.name: isLength
methods.description: Checks if a value is a valid array-like length.

methods.name: shimKeys
methods.description: Fallback for Object.keys, creating an array of own enumerable property names.

methods.name: toObject
methods.description: Converts a value to an object if it is not one.

methods.name: restParam
methods.description: Creates a function that invokes `func` with a rest parameter starting at `start` index.

methods.name: isArguments
methods.description: Checks if a value is an arguments object.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if a value is an Error object.

methods.name: isFunction
methods.description: Checks if a value is a function.

methods.name: isObject
methods.description: Checks if a value is an object or function.

methods.name: isNative
methods.description: Checks if a function is native.

methods.name: isString
methods.description: Checks if a value is a string or String object.

methods.name: keys
methods.description: Creates an array of own enumerable property names of an object.

methods.name: keysIn
methods.description: Creates an array of own and inherited enumerable property names.
